data.title: Flights to Tel Aviv (TLV) from $
data.meta_description: Book flights to Tel-Aviv with Condor and discover the unique charm of this region. There are cheap ticket options when booked online!
data.text:
There are several interesting options here but just walk along the streets of Jaffa for a breathtaking experience. Old Jaffais is delightful with its buzzing markets, Old Port, local restaurants and unique ambience. Take time to explore the museums, flea market, galleries and more.

A beautiful cobbled walkway along the beach linking Tel Aviv and Jaffa the De Tayelet is a wonderful way to see much of Tel Aviv. It takes you further down the city and is excellent for bikers. Bars, cafes and restaurants sit on the boulevard with hotels from deluxe to 3-star.

A fascinating art bonanza from different parts of the world it houses several outstanding permanent collections from the works of French Impressionists and finest contemporary Israeli artists. Temporary exhibitions from top museums can be seen here frequently. Paul Amir Building and Herta, the new wing is an architectural magnum opus.

There are kites of all shapes and sizes in the vibrant collection comprising of world-class pieces. Kites have played a key role in all cultures for centuries and can be enjoyed at their best. The display is divided into sections including old kites, comical kites, mechanical kites, fighting kites and musical kites.

Hayarkon Park rests in northern Tel Aviv with bicycle trails, plush lawns, the river flowing and several activities for everyone. A green sanctuary amidst the hustle and bustle of the large city. All looking for fresh air are attracted to the nice and cozy park with numerous things to do or just relax.

Tel Aviv is not a typical Middle Eastern city. Travel to this metropolis teeming with sea, sun and fun. Home to vibrant high-rise apartments, revolutionary skyscrapers and Art Deco and Bauhaus buildings this 100 years old city feels young. An amazing destination on the Dead Sea coast it is simple to find Condor's cheap flights to Tel Aviv and ensure a trip in your budget.

A cheap flight to Tel Aviv offers an opportunity to visit the fascinating chain of UNESCO World Heritage Bauhaus structures with several other attractions and events. With a plethora of varied attractions, shimmering beaches and a pulsating nightlife visitors are never short of activities in the charming capital. You are sure to find convenient flights to Tel Aviv with Condor on your next trip.

A flight to Tel Aviv with Condor offers cheap tickets. Capital Tel Aviv is also the financial heart of the country. If you may be visiting any city of Israel rest assured of the cheapest tickets. All flights may not be direct but you can comfortably change in Germany to reach Tel Aviv in about 4 hours. Relax with the cheapest flights in your budget.

Ben-Gurion Airport is about 20 kilometers from Tel Aviv and it takes about half an hour to reach the city. The international airport offers convenient transportation to many destinations. Take the train or faster by taxi after your long flight. Other options for getting from the Airport include the Egged bus, van and rented car. Book a cheap flight to Tel Aviv and begin your adventure.
